biotools.summary: The PubChem BioAssay database is a public repository for biological activities of small molecules and small interfering RNAs (siRNAs). It archives experimental descriptions of assays and biological test results. A PubChem BioAssay data entry includes an assay description, a summary and detailed test results. Each assay record is linked to the molecular target, whenever possible, and is cross-referenced to other NCBI database records.
